_header: God prosper long our noble King
Note: Found in many late collections of ballads.
Title(s): Chevy Chase; Hunting of the Cheviot
_description: Chevy Chase, a broadside version of the Hunting of the Cheviot (5432), composed in the sixteenth century — 64 quatrains
